newsitem.title: USA: TABLE - Rudy's Restaurant Q3 net increases.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Rudy's Restaurant Q3 net increases.

text.p: NOTE: Rudy's Restaurant Group said its third quarter period ended June 9.
The company said on July 23 that it had entered into an agreement to be acquired by Benihana Inc.
Net income for the third quarter of 1997 included a charge of $67,900 related to the non-cash amortization of the tax benefits of the company's NOLs.

The company said its earnings per share fot the third quarter of 1996 have not been restated to include this non-cash charge, however, if the charge had been considered, earnings per share would have been $0.12 and earnings per share for the first six months of the year would have been $0.27.
